alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Forest, eastern Florence, northeastern Marathon, Marinette, Menominee, northern Oconto, southern Langlade and western Shawano Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 817 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Florence to 9 miles southwest of Goodman to 7 miles north of White Lake to 11 miles west of Antigo to 14 miles southwest of Council Grounds State Park. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Florence and White Lake around 820 PM CDT. Antigo and Gardner Dam Scout Camp around 830 PM CDT. Wausau and Rib Mountain around 835 PM CDT. Mountain around 840 PM CDT. Weston, Wausaukee, Bear Paw Scout Camp and Neopit around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Lake Noseum, Breed, Mattoon, Polar, Birnamwood, High Falls Reservoir, Aurora, Mcclintock County Park, Caldron Falls Reservoir and Commonwealth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County
